author: vmote
msg: 1. Remove fo/FOTreeExternal and layoutmgr/LMFOTreeExternal (in favor of Visitor concept, see item 2)
3. Remove all occurrences of addLayoutManager in fo/FObj subclasses, replacing them with equivalent methods in AddLMVisitor

author: vmote
msg: 1. tie Document to fo.FOTreeBuilder and fo.pagination.Root
2. add getDocument() method to FONode (using this.parent for all nodes except Root)
3. start using getDocument() to gain access to font collections stored in Document

author: gmazza
msg: Removed error message when logger not explicitly set; Driver will continue to use ConsoleLogger as default in such circumstances.  (Allows for coding simple command-line processes without needing to explicitly code in Avalon ConsoleLoggers)

author: vmote
msg: add back test to make sure a renderer is present, which is needed for StructureRenderers
